dc.dcterms:creator: Coe, Helen - Project Coordinator, Grant Assist Program (Health Sciences)
Simala-Grant, Joanne - Director, Grant Assist Program (Health Sciences)
McPhalen, Cathy - PhD, thINK Editing
dc.dcterms:description: Outlined in this document are web-based resources to aid in the preparation of grant applications. Resources have been separated based on their relevance to: finding funding, peer review process, grantsmanship, common errors found in grant proposals and specific peer review information. Each resource is briefly described and rated out of 5 stars and colour coded designation found to the right of the title (CIHR, Health, General) indicates whether the resource is structured to provide advice about a specific funding agency. Additionally symbols indicate whether the resource is written word, a PowerPoint, audio or video.
dc.dcterms:subject: grantsmanship
resources
dc.dcterms:title: Dictionary of Web-based Grantsmanship Resources
